question: In which city, Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) launched its Human Space Flight Centre in 2019?
explanation: Dr K Kasturirangan, Former Chairman, ISRO in the presence of Dr K Sivan, Secretary, DOS/Chairman, ISRO, inaugurated Human Space Flight Centre (HSFC) on 30th January 2019 at ISRO Headquarter campus in Bengaluru, Karnataka.
